doc:
Velibor Topić https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Velibor_Topi%C4%87 0 Velibor Topić (born 1970 in Mostar, Bosnia and Herzegovina) is a Bosnian–Herzegovinian and English actor. He is known for his roles in Snatch (2000), Kingdom of Heaven (2005), Robin Hood (2010), The Counselor (2013), Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014), as well as for his work in British TV dramas such as Sharpe's Peril (2002), The Bill (2002) and Ambassadors (2013). Throughout his career, Topić has worked three times with Ridley Scott as well as other well-known directors such as Guy Ritchie, Tom Hooper, Matthew Vaughn, Anthony Minghella and William Monahan. Velibor_Topić ( born 1970 in Mostar , Bosnia and Herzegovina ) is a_Bosnian – Herzegovinian_and_English_actor . He is_known for his_roles in Snatch_(_2000_) , Kingdom of Heaven_(_2005_) , Robin_Hood_(_2010_) , The_Counselor_(_2013_) , Kingsman : The_Secret_Service_(_2014_) , as_well_as for his_work in British_TV_dramas such_as Sharpe 's_Peril_(_2002_) , The_Bill_(_2002_)_and_Ambassadors ( 2013_) . Throughout his_career , Topić has_worked three_times with Ridley_Scott as_well as other_well-known_directors such_as Guy_Ritchie , Tom_Hooper , Matthew_Vaughn , Anthony_Minghella and William_Monahan .
